title: 21 July '14
author: Niharika (Bug reporting system)
content:
I have been stuck at an issue for a couple of days. I generate Edit and Delete links in django-tables2 table dynamically, but they don’t seem to work. I tried a lot of different things but nothing helps. I raised the question on Stackoverflow here. Hopefully I’ll resolve this soon.

Originally posted on Niharika Kohli
